variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject identifier [Visit 1] [Pre ABPM Form]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 1] [Pre ABPM Form]

variable.name: BAPA1
variable.description: 1. Was the Ambulatory Blood Pressure Monitor instructions provided to the participant? [Visit 1] [Pre ABPM Form]

variable.name: BAPA2

variable.name: BAPA3
variable.description: 3. Did the participant verbally agree to wear the Ambulatory Blood Pressure Monitor? [Visit 1] [Pre ABPM Form]

variable.name: BAPA6

variable.name: BAPA15
